game.name: Helicopter Puzzle Challenge
game.description:
In this one of the highly engaging and challenging puzzle games for kids, you are sure to keep you engrossed for hours irrespective of your age or gender. Helicopters Puzzle Challenge is a wonderfully-designed brand new game that is a nice option for all. Put your brain and puzzle solving skills to test to clear each level in this free online jigsaw game! With three modes for each picture: easy, medium and hard, you can expect to enjoy a leisurely experience in the end. 
This jigsaw puzzle game has today become a favourite time pass activity for puzzle lovers from across the world. After choosing any mode, you will be redirected to a page where the icon of home page will be displayed on the left at the top of the screen and the icon of more games will be displayed on the right side. You can choose the arrow moving towards the left to go to the previous page or level. On the right side at the bottom of the page, you can see the hints, which can guide you to complete the puzzle.  
Use your brain to create the right picture in the least possible time in this one of the highly popular kids puzzle games! You can drag any piece displaying on the screen using your mouse. Connect the right pieces together to construct the picture in this HTML5 game! Invite your friends to become the part of the lovely brain game! Hope they will be highly thankful to you after playing this free online game in their devices! We are delighted a wide range of kids puzzle games at our free game website!
